This is for your information and record.

The said financial results and the Limited Review Report for the said period are attached herewith.

The Board meeting commenced at 1700hrs. and concluded at 1810 hrs.today.

You are requested to take the aforesaid on record.

Personnel of the Company w.e.f. August 9, 2023.

Nomination and Remuneration Committee and the Audit Committee, at their respective meetings held earlier in
the day.

Results').
We further declare that the Limited Review Report is with unmodified opinion on the Unaudited Financial
Results.
